entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is it possible to create a WPF application with .NET 7 that starts in the sys tray? #80088

Closed

  • SemaphoreSlim constructor parameter doc #79995
  • [NativeAOT] support calling UnmanagedCallersOnly functions before managed main() #77957
    Future

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix XML documentation #80085
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Use ArrayBuffer for read buffer management in HttpConnection #79524
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Improve the performance of ConditionalWeakTable.TryGetValue #80059
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Use QueueUserAPC2 in GC suspension, if available. #80087
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improving the SIMD codegen for SIMD12 load/store #80083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include corerun in Mono testhost #80082
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Use shipping runtime.json for RID targeting #80074
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use ArrayBuffer for write buffer management in HttpConnection #79525
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
